name: [LD43] Nino's Servants ~ The Day We Die For Her ~
name_original: [LD43] Nino's Servants ~ The Day We Die For Her ~
description:
Intro

This game is about a Nino’s adventure on claiming THE CROWN. Dogs and weird creatures, desperate for any meat they could find, are waiting for Nino coming right into their mouths.

Fortunately, all human being can be Nino’s servants, that they are willingly to do anything for this young beautiful cat, including giving up their own flesh & blood… Will Nino try to protect as many servants as she can? Or, the servants are just worthless that can be sacrificed for THE CROWN? It’s your choice

Gameplay
  • Nino can ‘collect’ human as servants
  • Nino can eliminate any foe with a cost of 1 hit point (5 points in total)
  • Servants are in different weights, and every foe has a number of desirable weights of meat. Yes, foes are not satisfied until they are fed with enough weights of human flesh (I’m really sick…) To ask servants sacrifice themselves, click the Go button on servant’s card
  • Servants can feed Nino with tiny fish, which will recover Nino for 1 hit point. But not all servants have fish in his/her pocket. To feed Nino, click the Feed button on servant’s card
